sdk-production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.';

production.pre-deploy-local: grunt deploy --sites=engagement-lab-website --target=sdk-production ; echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
production.post-deploy: cd /srv/engagement-lab-website-2.0/source ; npm i ; cd /srv/website/current/ ; npm link /srv/engagement-lab-website-2.0/current ; grunt compile --sites=engagement-lab-website ; pm2 restart 'server' --env production

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
staging.post-deploy: npm install ; grunt compile ; pm2 start server.js -- engagement-lab-website,boston-civic-media,city-accelerator-website --env staging
